+TriggerActionTwitterSendUpdateStatus_ErrorMessage=An error occurred while updating Twitter status. Please verify your Twitter app settings. (Error code: {0})
+TriggerActionTwitterSendDirectMessage_ErrorMessage=An error occurred while sending direct message. Please verify your Twitter app settings. (Error code: {0})
+TriggerActionTwitterVerifyTweeter_ErrorMessage=Attempted to send direct message from account not defined in the preferences. Please set up the account {0} in preferences first.
+TriggerActionTwitterUnauthorizedUser_Title=Unauthorized Twitter User
+TriggerActionTwitterUnauthorizedUser_ErrorMessage=User {0} has not been authorized in Preferences
\ No newline at end of file
